Given the following Terraform resource code snippet, rewrite it using the approved module standard. Ensure all mandatory parameters are included, defaults are respected, and best practices applied.

Terraform Resource Code:
resource "azure_storage_account_resource" "example" {
  resource_group_name = "example"
  location = "example"
  account_tier = "example"
  account_replication_type = "example"
  min_tls_version = "example"
  allow_blob_public_access = "example"
  tags = {}
}

Golden Module Standard: azure/storage_account

Given the following Terraform resource code snippet, rewrite it using the approved module standard. Ensure all mandatory parameters are included, defaults are respected, and best practices applied.

resource "azure_storage_account_resource" "example" {

  location = "example"
  account_tier = "example"
  account_replication_type = "example"

  allow_blob_public_access = "example_wrong"

Given the following Terraform resource code snippet, rewrite it using the approved module standard. Ensure all mandatory parameters are included, defaults are respected, and best practices applied.

Terraform Resource Code:
resource "azure_storage_account_resource" "example" {
  resource_group_name = "example"
  location = "example"
  account_tier = "example"
  account_replication_type = "example"
  min_tls_version = "example"
  allow_blob_public_access = "example"
  tags = { App = "MyApp" }
}

Golden Module Standard: azure/storage_account

Given the following Terraform resource code snippet, rewrite it using the approved module standard. Ensure all mandatory parameters are included, defaults are respected, and best practices applied.

Terraform Resource Code:
module "storage_account" {
  source = "../modules/azure/storage_account"
  min_tls_version = "example"
  resource_group_name = "example"
  allow_blob_public_access = "example"
  account_tier = "example"
  account_replication_type = "example"
  location = "example"
}
